00029   class MaintenanceTask {
00030   public:
00031     MaintenanceTask(boost::xtime start_time_) : start_time(start_time_), m_retry(false) { return; }
00032     MaintenanceTask(boost::xtime start_time_, time_t retry_delay_seconds) : start_time(start_time_), m_retry(true), m_retry_delay_seconds(retry_delay_seconds) { return; }
00033     MaintenanceTask() : m_retry(false) { boost::xtime_get(&start_time, boost::TIME_UTC); return; }
00034     MaintenanceTask(time_t retry_delay_seconds) : m_retry(true), m_retry_delay_seconds(retry_delay_seconds) { boost::xtime_get(&start_time, boost::TIME_UTC); return; }
00035     virtual ~MaintenanceTask() { return; }
00036     virtual void execute() = 0;
00037     boost::xtime start_time;
